Uses of Interface
io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerInvoker

  • Packages that use ChannelHandlerInvoker 
    Package Description
    io.netty.channel
    The core channel API which is asynchronous and event-driven abstraction of various transports such as a NIO Channel.

    • Uses of ChannelHandlerInvoker in io.netty.channel

      Classes in io.netty.channel that implement ChannelHandlerInvoker 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultChannelHandlerInvoker 
      Methods in io.netty.channel that return ChannelHandlerInvoker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChannelHandlerInvoker SingleThreadEventLoop.asInvoker() 
      ChannelHandlerInvoker EventLoop.asInvoker()
      Creates a new default ChannelHandlerInvoker implementation that uses this EventLoop to invoke event handler methods.
      ChannelHandlerInvoker ChannelHandlerContext.invoker()
      Returns the ChannelHandlerInvoker which is used to trigger an event for the associated ChannelHandler.
      ChannelHandlerInvoker Channel.Unsafe.invoker()
      Returns the ChannelHandlerInvoker which is used by default unless specified by a user.
      ChannelHandlerInvoker AbstractChannel.AbstractUnsafe.invoker() 
      Methods in io.netty.channel with parameters of type ChannelHandlerInvoker 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addAfter(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, String baseName, String name, ChannelHandler handler)
      Inserts a ChannelHandler after an existing handler of this pipeline.
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addBefore(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, String baseName, String name, ChannelHandler handler)
      Inserts a ChannelHandler before an existing handler of this pipeline.
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addFirst(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, ChannelHandler... handlers)
      Inserts a ChannelHandlers at the first position of this pipeline.
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addFirst(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, String name, ChannelHandler handler)
      Inserts a ChannelHandler at the first position of this pipeline.
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addLast(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, ChannelHandler... handlers)
      Inserts a ChannelHandlers at the last position of this pipeline.
      ChannelPipeline ChannelPipeline.addLast(ChannelHandlerInvoker invoker, String name, ChannelHandler handler)
      Appends a ChannelHandler at the last position of this pipeline.
